SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RETURN_ITEM R
JOIN RETURN_PROGRESS RP ON (R.R_NO = RP.R_NO) JOIN REITEM_HISTORY RH ON (RH.R_NO = R.R_NO) JOIN RETURN_ITEM_INFO RII ON(RII.ITEM_NO = RH.ITEM_NO) JOIN STORE S ON(S.STORE_NAME = RII.STORE_NAME)
JOIN RETURN_PROGRESS RP ON (R.R_NO = RP.R_NO)
S.STORE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
R.RETURN_PROGRESS LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
RP.R_PROGRESS LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'

SELECT DISTINCT A.RNUM , A.R_NO , A.STORE_NAME , A.STORE_REP , A.R_DATE , A.R_PROGRESS , A.R_DONE_DATE , A.RETURN_PROGRESS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.R_NO , B.STORE_NAME , B.STORE_REP , B.R_DATE , B.R_PROGRESS , B.R_DONE_DATE , B.RETURN_PROGRESS FROM (SELECT DISTINCT C.R_NO , S.STORE_NAME , S.STORE_REP , TO_CHAR(C.R_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS R_DATE , RP.R_PROGRESS , TO_CHAR(RP.R_DONE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS R_DONE_DATE , C.RETURN_PROGRESS FROM RETURN_ITEM C JOIN RETURN_PROGRESS RP ON (C.R_NO = RP.R_NO) JOIN REITEM_HISTORY RH ON (RH.R_NO = C.R_NO) JOIN RETURN_ITEM_INFO RII ON(RII.ITEM_NO = RH.ITEM_NO) JOIN STORE S ON(S.STORE_NAME = RII.STORE_NAME)
S.STORE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.RETURN_PROGRESS LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
RP.R_PROGRESS LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
ORDER BY C.R_NO ASC ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow }
) A WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow } ORDER BY A.R_NO ASC
